key_risks: Intense competition from industry giants like Nike and Adidas
Dependence on the North American market
Bearish market sentiment with high Put/Call Ratio
controversies: Lawsuits and reputational damage due to allegations of a toxic workplace culture and gender discrimination
Securities litigation case involving Class A and Class C common stock purchases
environmental_issues: Commitment to increasing the use of sustainable materials and reducing environmental footprint
social_issues: Allegations of a toxic workplace culture and gender discrimination
governance_issues: Leadership changes and strategic shifts under new CEO Stephanie Linnartz
